'''Caixa MÃ¡gica''' (CM) ({{lang-en|Magic Box}}) is a Portuguese [[Linux distribution]] created by Caixa MÃ¡gica Software. Its the most widely used in Portugal, It uses the [[RPM Package Manager]] and was created in 2000 by Paulo Trezentos and Daniel Neves at [[ADETTI]], a Portuguese research centre. There are two flavors: Desktop and Server. The current version is 12 and is based on [[Mandriva Linux]] [http://distrowatch.com/table.php?distribution=caixamagica].
